00018 using namespace std;

00020 //=============================================================================
00021 //
00022 // Create a Makefile for either an SPK Optimization request or
00023 // a Monte Carlo integration request.
00024 //
00025 // Pre-condtions   - myIsMonte is set to true if the post-integration is
00026 //                   going to be performed.  False otherwise.
00027 // 
00028 //                 - The current working directory is writable.
00029 //
00030 // Post-conditions - A file, Makefile.SPK, is saved in the current 
00031 //                   working directory.  The make file defines targets
00032 //                   that are either to build an optimization/simulation driver
00033 //                   or a post-integration driver.
00034 //
00035 //=============================================================================
00036 void NonmemTranslator::generateMakefile() const
00037 {
00038   ofstream oMakefile( fMakefile );
00039   if( !oMakefile.good() )
00040     {
00041       char mess[ SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen() ];
00042       snprintf( mess, 
00043         SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen(),
00044         "Failed to create %s file.", fMakefile ); 
00045       SpkCompilerException e( SpkCompilerError::ASPK_SOURCEML_ERR, mess, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
00046       throw e;
00047     }
00048 
00049   oMakefile << "PROD_DIR  = spkprod" << endl;
00050   oMakefile << "TEST_DIR  = spktest" << endl;
00051   oMakefile << endl;                                   
00052 
00053   oMakefile << "# C++ compiler flages to build a 64-bit version." << endl;
00054   oMakefile << "CXX_FLAGS_64_BIT = " << endl;
00055   oMakefile << "if [ `uname -i` = \"x86_64\" ]; then  CXX_FLAGS_64_BIT = -DBA0_64BITS; fi" << endl;
00056   oMakefile << endl;                                   
00057 
00058   oMakefile << "# C++ compiler flags to build a production version." << endl;
00059   oMakefile << "CXX_FLAGS_PROD = -O3 -Dspk_release -DNDEBUG $(CXX_FLAGS_64_BIT) " << endl;
00060   oMakefile << endl;
00061 
00062   oMakefile << "# C++ compiler flags to build a test version." << endl;
00063   oMakefile << "# These are the same as the production flags because the" << endl;
00064   oMakefile << "# test system will be deployed into the production system." << endl;
00065   oMakefile << "CXX_FLAGS = " << endl;
00066   oMakefile << "CXX_FLAGS_TEST = $(CXX_FLAGS_PROD) " << endl;
00067   oMakefile << endl;
00068 
00069   oMakefile << "# C++ compiler flags to build a debug version." << endl;
00070   oMakefile << "CXX_FLAGS_DEBUG = -g $(CXX_FLAGS_64_BIT) " << endl;
00071   oMakefile << endl;
00072 
00073   oMakefile << "# C++ compiler flags to turn on profiling" << endl;
00074   oMakefile << "# CXX_FLAGS += -pg -Dspk_profiling $(CXX_FLAGS_64_BIT) " << endl;
00075   oMakefile << endl;
00076 
00077   if( myModelSpec == ADVAN6 )
00078   {
00079     oMakefile << "# Define a macro \"ODEPRED\" when the job uses PRED." << endl;
00080     oMakefile << "CXX_FLAGS += -DODEPRED"; // Define "ODEPRED" macro
00081   }
00082   oMakefile << endl;                                        
00083 
00084   oMakefile << "LIBS      = -lspkpred -lspk -lnon_par -lmat2cpp -lQN01Box";
00085   oMakefile << " -lgsl -llapack -llapack_atlas -lcblas -latlas -lm -lxerces-c -lcln -lginac -lpvm3" << (myIsIdent? " -lbad -lbap -lbav -lba0 -lgslcblas" : "" ) << endl;
00086   oMakefile << endl;
00087 
00088   oMakefile << "COMMON_INCLUDE = \\" << endl;
00089   if( myIsIdent )
00090      oMakefile << "\tIdentPred.h \\" << endl;
00091   else if( myModelSpec == PRED )
00092      oMakefile << "\tPred.h \\" << endl;
00093   else if( myModelSpec == ADVAN6 )
00094      oMakefile << "\tOdePred.h \\" << endl;
00095   oMakefile << "\tDataSet.h \\" << endl;
00096   oMakefile << "\tIndData.h \\" << endl;
00097   oMakefile << "\tNonmemPars.h \\" << endl;
00098   oMakefile << endl;                                   
00099 
00100   if( !myIsMonte )
00101     {
00102       oMakefile << "prod : fitDriver.cpp $(COMMON_INCLUDE)" << endl;
00103       oMakefile << "\tg++ $(CXX_FLAGS_PROD) $(CXX_FLAGS) fitDriver.cpp -o driver ";
00104       oMakefile << "-L/usr/local/lib ";
00105       oMakefile << "-L/usr/local/lib/$(PROD_DIR) ";
00106       oMakefile << "-I/usr/local/include/$(PROD_DIR) ";
00107       oMakefile << "-I/usr/local/include/$(PROD_DIR)/CppAD ";
00108       oMakefile << "-L/usr/lib/atlas ";
00109       oMakefile << "-Wl,--rpath -Wl,/usr/local/lib ";
00110       oMakefile << "-Wl,--rpath -Wl,/usr/local/lib/$(PROD_DIR) ";
00111       oMakefile << " -I/usr/share/pvm3/include ";
00112       oMakefile << " -L/usr/share/pvm3/lib/LINUX ";
00113       oMakefile << " -L/usr/share/pvm3/lib/LINUX64 ";
00114       oMakefile << "$(LIBS)" << endl;
00115       oMakefile << endl;
00116       
00117       oMakefile << "prod_parallel : prod indDriver.cpp $(COMMON_INCLUDE)" << endl;
00118       oMakefile << "\tg++ $(CXX_FLAGS_PROD) $(CXX_FLAGS) indDriver.cpp -o indDriver ";
00119       oMakefile << "-L/usr/local/lib ";
00120       oMakefile << "-L/usr/local/lib/$(PROD_DIR) ";
00121       oMakefile << "-I/usr/local/include/$(PROD_DIR) ";
00122       oMakefile << "-I/usr/local/include/$(PROD_DIR)/CppAD ";

00130       oMakefile << endl;
